page.title: 09FOOD & COOKERY
page.content: People pride themselves on their cooking skills using both British and foreign recipes. Traditional dishes prepared from home produced foods are popular. Many grow fruit and vegetables in their gardens to supplement a wide variety of commercial crops and imports. Many worry about diet, food additives etc in pursuit of weight reduction or better health. Most meals are eaten at home, but occasional restaurant and take-away meals fill gaps or mark special events. Public houses provide a range of snacks and meals. Fish and chips, ice cream and snacks are available from several shops. Most children eat a midday meal at school and join the family for an early evening meal. Local shops stock a wide variety of foods. Milk is delivered to each house 4 times a week
